wikipedia_page.main: Barbara Strang née Barbara Mary Hope Carr later Lady Strang (20 April 1925 – 11 April 1982) was a British English language scholar.

response: *Barbara Strang, an English language scholar was born here in 1925.
He succeeded to the title in 1978. He married the English scholar Barbara Strang and they had one daughter. He married again twice. The peerage became extinct on his death in 2014.
